node.title: TƒÅneatua homicide: Man charged with aggravated robbery and assault
node.description: Police believe the man assaulted a 65-year-old man outside the bakery on Tuhoe Street on Monday afternoon and that he was linked to an earlier assualt of a 57-year-old man who later died.
node.content:
["Police have arrested and charged a man with aggravated robbery and assault, as part of a homicide investigation in Tāneatua.", "", "
The Ōpōtiki District Court. Photo: RNZ / Tom Furley
", "The 28-year-old will appear in the Ōpōtiki District Court today.", "Police believe the man assaulted a 65-year-old man outside the bakery on Tuhoe Street on Monday afternoon.", "They suspect he was linked to a group that assaulted a 57-year-old man in his home in Cobham Street, shortly beforehand.", "The 57-year old died in Waikato Hospital the next day."]
